summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Voxy SaaS landing page. All backend APIs and frontend components working perfectly. Form submission, mobile responsiveness, and user interactions all functional.
passed_tests: Backend health endpoint (/api/health) returns healthy status
Lead submission endpoint (/api/leads POST) accepts valid leads
Lead retrieval endpoint (/api/leads GET) returns stored leads
Form validation properly rejects incomplete/invalid data
Hero section displays headline, subheadline, and CTA button
How It Works section shows 3 step cards correctly
Differentiator section displays 'Waitâ€¦ was that a human?' content
Use Cases section shows all 4 use case cards
Lead capture form has all 5 required fields (name, email, company, phone, use_case)
Form submission works and displays success message
Hero CTA button scrolls to form section
Mobile responsiveness works across all sections
